divs: Sighting Details I wasat work when I happened to hear the dj saythat people had reported lights in the sky.Unusual to hear. While driving homefrom work that night just about 1 mile from the intersection of NYS RT 13 and31, i looked through my car windows and saw the object as described,well almost.There were two blinking lights, but I couldnt see any object between them! Inotice that its easy to see aircraft lights reflecting off of a fuselage andhow the red lights of a radio tower show up the structure, but this was odd inthe the object had no outline at all against the sky or reflected light froomits own two lights. I was tempted to stop, but remembering all the ill-effectsfrom othe encounters, I thought discrection was the better part of ufo research.What was interestin also, is that as I headed home and went up hill, thatthrough certain spots through the trees I coulld see the lights, but still nowobjecy, even though I was now abouve it ,and some 4-5 miles away.
Summary: blinking lights near my travel route
trends: There have been no other sightings in Lenox
This sighting has never been favorited.
